name: Lightening
description:
2D puzzle game with light. It's also an art game or interactive digital art. It was made in about 2 days. The theme of this game is about "sharing". In this game, we convey an idea of sharing light. It metaphorically show the process of handing on positive emotions, memories or experience between people.

Programmer: Mike, Cecilia

 Artist: Cecilia, Zizhe

Designer: Zhenglin, Orlic

Audio: Mike
